Reviews.Title: “Ignore these bad reviews, TOD is excellent for the budget traveller”

Reviews.Content: arrived las vegas time 19 saturday night overwhelmed idea stay called 4 hostels hotels found none availability eventually called tod guy reception friendlier assuring plenty looked forward seeing arrived checked international card saved 3 night key dorm cheapest cost 16 3 bunk beds 6 girls 2 japanese girls quiet immaculate sheets pillowcases crisp white towels handtowels shower gel bed night light hostel hotel bathroom kitchen im fussy traveller idea hostels makes uncomfortable own safe cosy common 2 doors kitchen microwave free wifi tv spent saturday night canadian woman homemade banana pancakes maple syrup journey home reception staff friendly guys amazing cant wait head month
